name: Dune Buggy
overview:
Dune Buggy, Midway, 2/72, #552. Inside the cabinet is large flat course. The dune buggy is attached to a boom and the player manuvers about the course against time while scoring points for clearing obstacles. Game is timed. Probably similar to the Midway Jet Rider (1/71).

Sound info thanks to Mark: uses a consumer-type 8-track player for background music. Each of the two stereo channels has a different tune. The same pair of tunes is on all four tracks of the 8-track tape. Both tunes are similar twangy-guitar surfing style music, 2 minutes 3 seconds long. Turns out the right channel has "Lies" by Randell and Charles, made famous by the Knickerbockers in the sixties.
